content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/holon-examples is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the current Maven configuration (pom.xml files)
3. Update Java version to 17 in all pom.xml files
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to identify any issues
5. Fix any issues that arise
6. Ensure the build passes with JDK 17

Let's start!
